textBeforeTable: Flowers Foods Inc's Total Liabilities for the fiscal year that ended in Dec. 2014 is calculated as Total liabilities are the liabilities that the company has to pay others. It is a part of the balance sheet of a company that shareholders do not own, and would be obligated to pay back if the company liquidated. Definition Flowers Foods Inc's annual total liabilities increased from Dec. 2012 ($1,137.23 Mil) to Dec. 2013 ($1,427.83 Mil) but then declined from Dec. 2013 ($1,427.83 Mil) to Dec. 2014 ($1,285.93 Mil).
